Your Personalized Recovery Plan

From your answers, I see both stress pressure and inconsistent sleep patterns that can keep shedding active. This first step focuses on anchoring your bedtime, because steady sleep is the foundation your body and follicles need to shift from onset into stabilization. Think of it as creating a calmer rhythm that reduces stress signals and gives your hair the breathing room to start recovering. Small changes here can unlock big progress. âœ¨
